title: Financial Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trilogy (Austin, TX) in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: Very long and tiring process Too many questions and less time Have to take a number of questions and tests about critical thinking, numerical thinking and so on. I was tired of the whole process and decided to stick to another company

title: Senior Software Engineer Interview
Application Type: The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Trilogy (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Best interview process with hardly any interaction. Just assessments  that get graded automatically. I did not accept the offer so I do not know how the proctored tests work. Will apply again for another position.

title: Software Development Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Trilogy in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: They hire by Crossover, I don't recommend. First step is to take a cognitive aptitude test for which the minimum required is 6/6 stars. It's 50 multiple choice questions in 15 mins which is almost impossible. I got above 30 and was in the 70th percentile (3/6 stars) and was rejected 2 seconds after hitting submit answer for the last question. Don't waste your time.
Interview Questions:
If 1500 eggs are bought at $1.5 per dozen and the price per dozen increases to $1.8, how much more money did they spend? 

It was something like that. And you have about 18s to solve it without a calculator.

title: School Based Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Trilogy
Interview Descriptions: About a week after applying, I got an email to set up a phone screening/interview with HR. He was enthusiastic and very informative during the call, also upfront about pay. I had a request for the 2nd interview before the end of that day. The next week, I had a virtual interview with the PM and TL. They were nice and friendly, also answered all my questions. I had an offer within 24hrs.
Interview Questions: What would you say are your 3 biggest accomplishments?

title: Child and Adolescent Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Trilogy in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a bit uncomfortable, I felt like I was in a therapy session instead of an interview. Discussed a lot of great training offered to staff as well as what caseload would look like. Pay is different for clinical versus non clinical hours.

title: Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trilogy
Interview Descriptions: An initial phone call was made by HR and then was invited to an in person interview. HR did a standard screening including salary review. The 1:1 interview took approximately an hour.
Interview Questions: What was one time you had someone disagree with your opinion in a professional setting. How did you address it?

title: Employment Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trilogy (Chicago, IL)
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, phone interview with HR questions; in-person interview with HR and program manager, job shadowing which was very very helpful in seeing what the day to day life is like. I would love this company and this position if I wasn't experiencing awful amounts of student loan debt hanging over my head.
Interview Questions: What do you know about Motivational Interviewing

title: Environmental Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Trilogy (Princeton, IN) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: First they do a personality interview. You may be able to teach someone a job, but you can’t teach them respect, courtesy, common sense, and compassion. Those are what they look for. Then you do a day of job shadowing to see what you’ll be doing on a daily basis. Finally you have an interview with the Executive Director.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at a nursing home?

title: Recovery Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trilogy in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was very quick and easy. It was done onsite at their Greenleaf location with one of their Human Resource Representatives. There was a written and verbal portion to the interview
Interview Questions: How well do you work on a team?

title: CST Recovery Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Trilogy (Chicago, IL) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions:
1. Initial Interview General HR 
2. Second Interview with Team Member & Supervisor 

I had to initiate to call for for follow-up. 

CST Recovery Team is looking for someone who is fully commited to the job. There's lot of high turn over rates. They emphazied a lot on life and work balance.  Overall My interview was very positive with welcoming team and HR.
Interview Questions: Have you worked with elders with mental illiness.

title: Employment Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trilogy (Chicago, IL) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: It was a two step process.  I applied online, and got a phone screening from HR and then came in for a sit in interview and then had a shadow.

title: Team Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Trilogy (Chicago, IL) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: The interview was scheduled quickly and was held in person with the immediate supervisor and program director. Questions were primarily behavioral in nature, with specific situations requested and discussed based on past experience.
Interview Questions: How do you handle conflict within teams?

title: Occupational Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Trilogy (Chicago, IL) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: First a phone screen that was approximately 30 minutes with overview of job, benefits offered, and salary. Then a in person interview was scheduled for the following week with an OT and another supervisor. The interview was initially behavior based questions then moved into more job related questions.
Interview Questions: What is your comfort level with bed bugs, roaches, etc?

title: CST Recovery Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Trilogy (Chicago, IL) in May 2014
Interview Descriptions: Received one phone call from HR; met with program manager and Director of Outreach Services, asked various questions regarding clinical background, client centered care, and harm reduction. Discussed standard of care within community mental health and requirements of the job.The interview was timely and pleasant; I was given easy directions to visit the facility.
Interview Questions: How would you deal with a client who was flirting with you during an appointment.

title: Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Trilogy (Chicago, IL) in May 2014
Interview Descriptions: I was referred to the agency by a former employee. After the application was submitted, I interviewed with HR representatives. If they approved and I met the eligibility requirements, I then interviewed with my teams' director and supervisor.
Interview Questions: History working with individuals (adults) that have been diagnosed with a mental illness.

title: Recovery Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Trilogy (Chicago, IL) in Mar 2014
Interview Descriptions: HR interviewer asks standard HR questions and is professional through the interview. If you have personally experienced a mental illness it is not required to mention it during the interview but it may help you get hired as it enhances the chances of a job offer.
